name: Top Fun 10 VR
description: A virtual reality game where you explore towns and forests where you have to fight for your life to find your princess and save her from the enemy. Pick up health and try to survive on large open game boards where you fight Raptors, Zombies and Magical Creatures in an full Open World. A Variety of weapons are at your disposal and you can carry them in your backpack or holster. Fighting includes Hand To Hand Combat, grabbing enemy characters, shooting laser balls, old style combat with shields and swords. You can Climb rock walls and Climb ladders also throw rocks and boulders at your foes. Find key cards on the boards to unlock the door to the next board or to open a club where you can hang out with the characters that where after you in a peaceful environment. There are four large boards to start with more to come in the immediate future we will keep you posted when new boards released.
